text.data: Chapter 10 Rainbow Bridge[end1]
Mahal, the continent of miracles...[end1]
Nobody knows how Mahal came to be called this...[end1]
With weather always nice... And a large lake...[end1]
There resides a people whose hearts are very pure...[end1]
Within Orelus, where many lagoons float...[end1]
Perhaps people call it a miracle because of its unrivaled beauty...[end1]
The bridge where rainbows appear... Also known as the Rainbow Bridge...[end1]
Day and night, men and women flock to this most famous tourist site in Mahal.[end1]
Those who see the rainbows from here will have any wish come true...[end1]
However, nobody has been heard to have seen the rainbows.[end1]
Matelite: Hey! Is anybody here?[end]
Anybody here? If somebody's here, say something![end]
No good! Nobody's here! This place was attacked by the Empire too![end]
Lukia: ...! That's...[end]
Matelite: Damn the Empire! Why did they do this?![end]
Sendak: Hmm... where is Taicho? I feel uneasy... it must be my old man sense...[end]

Matelite: We're going to go look for Taicho!
[character][0x1], you look around the area one more time![end]

Sendak: It is so cold... I think I am coming down with something...
Will we attack?[end]
Wait Attack[end1]
Lukia: There's nobody here...![end]
Donfan: So these are dragons...!! Wow![end]
Battlefield Salesman: Hello![end]
Weapons Armor Items[end1]
Thank you very much.[end]
You got a Nimbus Robe.[end]
You got a Guardian.[end]
You got 6 Earth Grasses.[end]
You got 5 Sweet Wines.[end]
Donfan: The Resistance...? Lukia...? Is that Lukia?![end]
Lukia: Donfan! Are you alright?[end]
Donfan: Why?! Why did you come back to Mahal? I had completely forgotten all of our memories together.[end]
Lukia: Donfan... we'll talk later, okay? Right now we need as much help as we can get! Help us defeat the Empire![end]
Donfan: ...Am I wrong, Lukia? You weren't able to forget about me...[end]
But you just wanted to watch over me from the shadows... You wanted to see my face once more...[end]

Your agony continued for many days... Suddenly realizing... You brought yourself to Mahal... To Donfan... To see him once more... Am I wrong?
Even looking like this, I... Inside your heart... I can read your mind as if I were looking through stained glass.[end]
Lukia: No!! Donfan! Listen to what I'm saying...[end]
Donfan: Lukia, you don't have to lie and say it was because you were embarrassed. Moreover, I do not intend to deny the truth that has appeared inside you.[end]
Lukia: What are you talking about?! It's nothing like that![end]
Donfan: Look at the lake of Mahal...[end]
Donfan: I've been staring at this lake all this time...[end]
Yes... Lukia... While thinking of your face I would stare at this lake.[end]
Lukia: You don't get it do you... Long ago... Your...[end]
Donfan: When night would fall, I would gaze at the water's surface and smile like you do. Yes, like this... Then... I would silently whisper, [0x24]Lukia... This is for you only...[0x22][end]
Where are you now?[end]
What are you doing now?[end]
Are you okay?[end]
I am doing fine...[end]
The inside of my heart[end]
Is blue like this lake,[end]
But without ever forgetting your face,[end]
I lived each day all alone...[end]
Lukia: Stupid![end]
Donfan: Ahh! No! Why!![end]
Uh... You, traveler, could you maybe... I'm very sorry, but could you help me?[end]
Will you help Donfan?[end]
Yes No[end1]
Donfan: No! Don't leave me alone!![end]
Donfan: [0x2a]cough[0x2a] [0x2a]cough[0x2a] Thanks... Thanks for saving me. I don't even know your name...[end]
You! You're [character][0x1], captain of Kahna's Dragon Squad, aren't you?![end]
I heard lots of stories about you long ago.[end]
I am Donfan of Mahal. People call me the pure-hearted and serious Donfan.[end]
I don't intentionally try to be serious, but I seem to appear that way around people.[end]
I also heard that Taicho is a part of the Resistance.[end]
Such is the way of the world...[end]
I, Donfan, would also like to join your party.[end]
Okay, okay. We don't need you.[end1]
Donfan: I see... [0x2a]sniff[0x2a][end]
Donfan: Really? Do you really need my help? Then you've chosen the right man for the job. I think I might be useful to you.[end]
Jeanne: Donfan![end]
Donfan: Well if it isn't the Light Armor soldier, Jeanne! How are you doing? Hmm... Are you busy today?![end]
Jeanne: I don't have time for your girl-hunting antics![end]
But never mind that! Taicho has gone into Lestat's moldy old palace![end]
Donfan: Lestat...? The Empire...? Heh... With me in your party you needn't be afraid of the Empire.[end]
Jeanne: What are you talking about?! This isn't a joke![end]
Matelite of Kahna has somehow calmed down for now, but we must hurry![end]
Donfan: Are you kidding?! Jeanne... I don't blame you for wanting to see my face.[end]
Right? Because I'm inside your heart...[end]
I can read your mind like I was looking through stained glass.[end]
Jeanne: Shut up! I don't want to hear that line from you![end]
Jeanne: We'll go first and wait for you! When you're ready, meet up with us![end]
Donfan: Um... Captain [character][0x1]! Could you help me once again?[end]
Will you help Donfan?[end]
Okay. No way![end1]
Donfan: Jeanne is really cute. She's just shy... It's tough being a popular guy.[end]
Oh!! So these are the famous battle dragons of Kahna. Wow![end][end]
